In edit mode, let the user choose the doc type + target #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') = Type and Target = $doc.display('type') $doc.display('target') #end ## Display the content #if ($doc.getValue('type') == 'howto') = Steps = #elseif ($doc.getValue('type') == 'explanation') = Explanation = #elseif ($doc.getValue('type') == 'tutorial') = Tutorial = #elseif ($doc.getValue('type') == 'reference') = Reference = #end ## If there are UIXs, use them (so that they can display structured data), otherwise display the content as is. #set ($uixExecuted = false) #set ($uixs = $services.uix.getExtensions('org.xwiki.contrib.documentation.sheet.content', {'sortByParameter' : 'order'})) #foreach($uix in $uixs) #if ($services.security.authorization.hasAccess('admin', $uix.authorReference, $services.wiki.currentWikiDescriptor.reference)) #set ($content = $services.rendering.render($uix.execute(), 'html/5.0').trim()) #if ("$!content" != '') {{html clean="false"}} $content {{/html}} #set ($uixExecuted = true) #end #end #end #if (!$uixExecuted) $doc.display('content') #end ## Display the FAQ section if it's not empty #if ($hasFAQ || $xcontext.action == 'edit') = FAQ = #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') Notes: * Include troubleshooting questions, small and specific explanations, etc. * Only for topics specific to the page and that should be not widely visible and findable from filtering from the top level of the documentation. * Maximum of 1-2 sentences. Longer text should be put in a dedicated page. #end $doc.display('faq') #end ## Display the More section if it's not empty ## TODO: only display if the Ld is not empty #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') = Highlights = Use a list syntax to represent the different highlighted documentation pages, with the first list item level being the title and the second level, the description. For example, in XWiki Syntax 2.0+: {{code language="none"}} * Title 1 ** Description 1 * Title 2 ** Description 2 {{/code}} $doc.display('highlights') #end #if ($xcontext.action != 'edit') = More = #set ($highlights = $doc.getValue('highlights')) #if ("$!highlights" != '') $services.localization.render('docapp.more.textWithHighlights') #else $services.localization.render('docapp.more.textWithoutHighlights') #end {{html}}
